General.Name: Advanced Ceramic X
General.Description: Advanced Ceramic X Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells RF front-end devices and modules for wireless communication applications in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. It offers antenna switch modules; filters, such as balun, balanced filter, diplexers, triplexers, couplers, chip antenna, bluetooth modules, and RF front end modules. The company provides antenna; couplers and couplers filters; low pass, high pass, and band pass filters, as well as filter arrays; pentaplexers; power dividers; high frequency inductors; and RF chip ceramic devices. Advanced Ceramic X Corporation was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 16 Tzu Chiang Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30352
